67 int CG_Text_Width_Ext(const char *text, float scale, int limit, fontHelper_t *font)
68 {
69  float out = 0;
70 
71  if (text)
72  {
73  const char *s = text;
74  glyphInfo_t *glyph;
75  int count = 0;
76  int len = Q_UTF8_Strlen(text);
77 
78  if (limit > 0 && len > limit)
79  {
80  len = limit;
81  }
82 
83  while (s && *s && count < len)
84  {
85  if (Q_IsColorString(s))
86  {
87  s += 2;
88  continue;
89  }
90  else
91  {
92  glyph = Q_UTF8_GetGlyph(font, s);
93  out += glyph->xSkip;
94  s += Q_UTF8_Width(s);
95  count++;
96  }
97  }
98  }
99 
100  return out * scale * Q_UTF8_GlyphScale(font);
101 }

125 int CG_Text_Height_Ext(const char *text, float scale, int limit, fontHelper_t *font)
126 {
127  float max = 0;
128 
129  if (text)
130  {
131  const char *s = text;
132  glyphInfo_t *glyph;
133  int count = 0;
134  int len = Q_UTF8_Strlen(text);
135 
136  if (limit > 0 && len > limit)
137  {
138  len = limit;
139  }
140 
141  while (s && *s && count < len)
142  {
143  if (Q_IsColorString(s))
144  {
145  s += 2;
146  continue;
147  }
148  else
149  {
150  glyph = Q_UTF8_GetGlyph(font, s);
151  if (max < glyph->height)
152  {
153  max = glyph->height;
154  }
155  s += Q_UTF8_Width(s);
156  count++;
157  }
158  }
159  }
160  return max * scale * Q_UTF8_GlyphScale(font);
161 }

254 void CG_Text_Paint_Ext(float x, float y, float scalex, float scaley, vec4_t color, const char *text, float adjust, int limit, int style, fontHelper_t *font)
255 {
256  if (text)
257  {
258  vec4_t newColor;
259  glyphInfo_t *glyph;
260  const char *s = text;
261  float yadj;
262  int len, count = 0, ofs;
263 
264  scalex *= Q_UTF8_GlyphScale(font);
265  scaley *= Q_UTF8_GlyphScale(font);
266 
267  trap_R_SetColor(color);
268  Com_Memcpy(&newColor[0], &color[0], sizeof(vec4_t));
269  len = Q_UTF8_Strlen(text);
270  if (limit > 0 && len > limit)
271  {
272  len = limit;
273  }
274 
275  while (s && *s && count < len)
276  {
277  glyph = Q_UTF8_GetGlyph(font, s);
278 
279  if (Q_IsColorString(s))
280  {
281  if (*(s + 1) == COLOR_NULL)
282  {
283  Com_Memcpy(newColor, color, sizeof(newColor));
284  }
285  else
286  {
287  Com_Memcpy(newColor, g_color_table[ColorIndex(*(s + 1))], sizeof(newColor));
288  newColor[3] = color[3];
289  }
290  trap_R_SetColor(newColor);
291  s += 2;
292  continue;
293  }
294  else
295  {
296  yadj = scaley * glyph->top;
297 
298  if (style == ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWED || style == ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWEDMORE)
299  {
300  ofs = style == ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWED ? 1 : 2;
301  colorBlack[3] = newColor[3];
302  trap_R_SetColor(colorBlack);
303  CG_Text_PaintChar_Ext(x + (glyph->pitch * scalex) + ofs, y - yadj + ofs, glyph->imageWidth, glyph->imageHeight, scalex, scaley, glyph->s, glyph->t, glyph->s2, glyph->t2, glyph->glyph);
304  colorBlack[3] = 1.0;
305  trap_R_SetColor(newColor);
306  }
307  CG_Text_PaintChar_Ext(x + (glyph->pitch * scalex), y - yadj, glyph->imageWidth, glyph->imageHeight, scalex, scaley, glyph->s, glyph->t, glyph->s2, glyph->t2, glyph->glyph);
308  x += (glyph->xSkip * scalex) + adjust;
309  s += Q_UTF8_Width(s);
310  count++;
311  }
312  }
313  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
314  }
315 }

347 void CG_Text_PaintWithCursor_Ext(float x, float y, float scale, vec4_t color, const char *text, int cursorPos, const char *cursor, int limit, int style, fontHelper_t *font)
348 {
349  vec4_t newColor = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
350  glyphInfo_t *glyph, *glyph2;
351  float useScale = scale * Q_UTF8_GlyphScale(font);
352 
353  if (text)
354  {
355  float yadj;
356  int len = Q_UTF8_Strlen(text);
357  int count = 0;
358  const char *s = text;
359 
360  trap_R_SetColor(color);
361  Com_Memcpy(&newColor[0], &color[0], sizeof(vec4_t));
362 
363  if (limit > 0 && len > limit)
364  {
365  len = limit;
366  }
367 
368  glyph2 = Q_UTF8_GetGlyph(font, cursor);
369  while (s && *s && count < len)
370  {
371  glyph = Q_UTF8_GetGlyph(font, s);
372  yadj = useScale * glyph->top;
373 
374  if (style == ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWED || style == ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWEDMORE)
375  {
376  int ofs = style == ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWED ? 1 : 2;
377 
378  colorBlack[3] = newColor[3];
379  trap_R_SetColor(colorBlack);
380  CG_Text_PaintChar(x + (glyph->pitch * useScale) + ofs, y - yadj + ofs,
381  glyph->imageWidth,
382  glyph->imageHeight,
383  useScale,
384  glyph->s,
385  glyph->t,
386  glyph->s2,
387  glyph->t2,
388  glyph->glyph);
389  colorBlack[3] = 1.0;
390  trap_R_SetColor(newColor);
391  }
392  CG_Text_PaintChar(x + (glyph->pitch * useScale), y - yadj,
393  glyph->imageWidth,
394  glyph->imageHeight,
395  useScale,
396  glyph->s,
397  glyph->t,
398  glyph->s2,
399  glyph->t2,
400  glyph->glyph);
401 
402  // CG_DrawPic(x, y - yadj, scale * uiDC.Assets.textFont.glyphs[text[i]].imageWidth, scale * uiDC.Assets.textFont.glyphs[text[i]].imageHeight, uiDC.Assets.textFont.glyphs[text[i]].glyph);
403  yadj = useScale * glyph2->top;
404  if (count == cursorPos && !((cgDC.realTime / BLINK_DIVISOR) & 1))
405  {
406  CG_Text_PaintChar(x + (glyph->pitch * useScale), y - yadj,
407  glyph2->imageWidth,
408  glyph2->imageHeight,
409  useScale,
410  glyph2->s,
411  glyph2->t,
412  glyph2->s2,
413  glyph2->t2,
414  glyph2->glyph);
415  }
416 
417  x += (glyph->xSkip * useScale);
418  s += Q_UTF8_Width(s);
419  count++;
420 
421  }
422  // need to paint cursor at end of text
423  if (cursorPos == len && !((cgDC.realTime / BLINK_DIVISOR) & 1))
424  {
425  yadj = useScale * glyph2->top;
426  CG_Text_PaintChar(x + (glyph2->pitch * useScale), y - yadj,
427  glyph2->imageWidth,
428  glyph2->imageHeight,
429  useScale,
430  glyph2->s,
431  glyph2->t,
432  glyph2->s2,
433  glyph2->t2,
434  glyph2->glyph);
435  }
436 
437  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
438  }
439 }

471 void CG_DrawTeamBackground(int x, int y, int w, int h, float alpha, int team)
472 {
473  vec4_t hcolor;
474 
475  if (team == TEAM_AXIS)
476  {
477  hcolor[0] = 1;
478  hcolor[1] = 0;
479  hcolor[2] = 0;
480  hcolor[3] = alpha;
481  }
482  else if (team == TEAM_ALLIES)
483  {
484  hcolor[0] = 0;
485  hcolor[1] = 0;
486  hcolor[2] = 1;
487  hcolor[3] = alpha;
488  }
489  else
490  {
491  return;
492  }
493  trap_R_SetColor(hcolor);
494  CG_DrawPic(x, y, w, h, cgs.media.teamStatusBar);
495  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
496 }

509 static void CG_DrawTeamInfo(void)
510 {
511  int chatHeight = TEAMCHAT_HEIGHT;
512 
513  // no need to adjust chat height for intermission here - CG_DrawTeamInfo is called from CG_Draw2D
514  if (cg_teamChatHeight.integer < TEAMCHAT_HEIGHT)
515  {
516  chatHeight = cg_teamChatHeight.integer;
517  }
518 
519  if (chatHeight <= 0)
520  {
521  return; // disabled
522  }
523 
524  if (cgs.teamLastChatPos != cgs.teamChatPos)
525  {
526  vec4_t hcolor;
527  int i;
528  float lineHeight = 9.f;
529  float alphapercent;
530  float scale = 0.2f;
531  float icon_width = 12.f;
532  float icon_height = 8.f;
533  int chatWidth = 320;
534  int chatPosX = ((int)Ccg_WideX(SCREEN_WIDTH) - chatWidth) / 2;
535 
536  if (cg.time - cgs.teamChatMsgTimes[cgs.teamLastChatPos % chatHeight] > cg_teamChatTime.integer)
537  {
538  cgs.teamLastChatPos++;
539  }
540 
541  for (i = cgs.teamChatPos - 1; i >= cgs.teamLastChatPos; i--)
542  {
543  alphapercent = 1.0f - (cg.time - cgs.teamChatMsgTimes[i % chatHeight]) / (float)(cg_teamChatTime.integer);
544  if (alphapercent > 1.0f)
545  {
546  alphapercent = 1.0f;
547  }
548  else if (alphapercent < 0)
549  {
550  alphapercent = 0.f;
551  }
552 
553  // chatter team instead
554  if (cgs.teamChatMsgTeams[i % chatHeight] == TEAM_AXIS)
555  {
556  hcolor[0] = 1;
557  hcolor[1] = 0;
558  hcolor[2] = 0;
559  }
560  else if (cgs.teamChatMsgTeams[i % chatHeight] == TEAM_ALLIES)
561  {
562  hcolor[0] = 0;
563  hcolor[1] = 0;
564  hcolor[2] = 1;
565  }
566  else
567  {
568  hcolor[0] = 0;
569  hcolor[1] = 1;
570  hcolor[2] = 0;
571  }
572 
573  hcolor[3] = 0.66f * alphapercent;
574 
575  trap_R_SetColor(hcolor);
576  CG_DrawPic(chatPosX, CHATLOC_Y - (cgs.teamChatPos - i) * lineHeight, chatWidth, lineHeight, cgs.media.teamStatusBar);
577 
578  hcolor[0] = hcolor[1] = hcolor[2] = 1.0;
579  hcolor[3] = alphapercent;
580  trap_R_SetColor(hcolor);
581 
582  // chat icons
583  if (cgs.teamChatMsgTeams[i % chatHeight] == TEAM_AXIS)
584  {
585  CG_DrawPic(chatPosX, CHATLOC_Y - (cgs.teamChatPos - i - 0.9f) * lineHeight - 8, icon_width, icon_height, cgs.media.axisFlag);
586  }
587  else if (cgs.teamChatMsgTeams[i % chatHeight] == TEAM_ALLIES)
588  {
589  CG_DrawPic(chatPosX, CHATLOC_Y - (cgs.teamChatPos - i - 0.9f) * lineHeight - 8, icon_width, icon_height, cgs.media.alliedFlag);
590  }
591  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(chatPosX + 16, CHATLOC_Y - (cgs.teamChatPos - i - 1) * lineHeight - 1, scale, scale, hcolor, cgs.teamChatMsgs[i % chatHeight], 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
592  }
593  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
594  }
595 }

602 const char *CG_PickupItemText(int itemNum)
603 {
604  gitem_t *item;
605 
606  item = BG_GetItem(itemNum);
607 
608  if (item->giType == IT_HEALTH)
609  {
610  return va(CG_TranslateString("a %s"), item->pickup_name);
611  }
612 
613  if (item->giType == IT_TEAM)
614  {
615  return CG_TranslateString("an Objective");
616  }
617 
618  // FIXME: this is just related to english
619  if (item->pickup_name[0] == 'a' || item->pickup_name[0] == 'A')
620  {
621  return va(CG_TranslateString("an %s"), item->pickup_name);
622  }
623 
624  return va(CG_TranslateString("a %s"), item->pickup_name);
625 }

633 #define CP_LINEWIDTH (int)(Ccg_WideX(56))
634 
640 static int CG_FormatCenterPrint(char *s)
641 {
642  char *lastSpace = NULL;
643  int i, len, lastLR = 0;
644  int lineWidth, lineNumber = 1;
645  qboolean neednewline = qfalse;
646 
647  len = Q_UTF8_PrintStrlen(s);
648  lineWidth = CP_LINEWIDTH;
649 
650  for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
651  {
652  if (Q_IsColorString(s))
653  {
654  s += 2;
655  }
656 
657  if ((i - lastLR) >= lineWidth)
658  {
659  neednewline = qtrue;
660  }
661 
662  if (*s == ' ')
663  {
664  lastSpace = s;
665  }
666 
667  if (neednewline && lastSpace)
668  {
669  *lastSpace = '\n';
670  lastSpace = NULL;
671  lastLR = i;
672  lineNumber++;
673  neednewline = qfalse;
674  }
675 
676  // count the number of lines for centering
677  if (*s == '\n')
678  {
679  lastLR = i;
680  lineNumber++;
681  }
682 
683  s += Q_UTF8_Width(s);
684  }
685 
686  // we reach the end of the string and it doesn't fit in on line
687  if (neednewline && lastSpace)
688  {
689  *lastSpace = '\n';
690  lineNumber++;
691  }
692 
693  return lineNumber;
694 }

717 void CG_PriorityCenterPrint(const char *str, int y, float fontScale, int priority)
718 {
719  // don't draw if this print message is less important
720  if (cg.centerPrintTime && priority < cg.centerPrintPriority)
721  {
722  return;
723  }
724 
725  Q_strncpyz(cg.centerPrint, str, sizeof(cg.centerPrint));
726  cg.centerPrintLines = CG_FormatCenterPrint(cg.centerPrint);
727  cg.centerPrintPriority = priority;
728  cg.centerPrintLines = 1;
729  cg.centerPrintTime = cg.time + 2000;
730  cg.centerPrintY = y;
731  cg.centerPrintCharHeight = CG_Text_Height_Ext("A", fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
732  cg.centerPrintCharWidth = CG_Text_Width_Ext("A", fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
733  cg.centerPrintFontScale = fontScale;
734 }

739 static void CG_DrawCenterString(void)
740 {
741  char *start, *end;
742  int len;
743  char currentColor[3] = S_COLOR_WHITE;
744  char nextColor[3] = { 0, 0, 0 };
745  int x, y, w;
746  float *color;
747 
748  if (!cg.centerPrintTime)
749  {
750  return;
751  }
752 
753  color = CG_FadeColor(cg.centerPrintTime, (int)(1000 * cg_centertime.value));
754  if (!color)
755  {
756  cg.centerPrintTime = 0;
757  cg.centerPrintPriority = 0;
758  return;
759  }
760 
761  trap_R_SetColor(color);
762 
763  y = cg.centerPrintY - cg.centerPrintLines * cg.centerPrintCharHeight / 2;
764 
765  for (start = end = cg.centerPrint; *start; end += len)
766  {
767  if (Q_IsColorString(end))
768  {
769  // don't store color if the line start with a color
770  if (start == end)
771  {
772  Com_Memset(currentColor, 0, 3);
773  }
774 
775  // store the used color to reused it in case the line is splitted on multi line
776  Q_strncpyz(nextColor, end, 3);
777  len = 2;
778  }
779  else
780  {
781  len = Q_UTF8_Width(end);
782  }
783 
784  if (!*end || *end == '\n')
785  {
786  char linebuffer[1024] = { 0 };
787 
788  if (*currentColor)
789  {
790  Q_strncpyz(linebuffer, currentColor, 3);
791  Q_strcat(linebuffer, (end - start) + 3, start);
792  }
793  else
794  {
795  Q_strncpyz(linebuffer, start, (end - start) + 1);
796  }
797 
798  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(linebuffer, cg.centerPrintFontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
799  x = Ccg_WideX(320) - w / 2;
800 
801  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(x, y, cg.centerPrintFontScale, cg.centerPrintFontScale, colorWhite, linebuffer, 0, 0, ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWED, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
802 
803  y += cg.centerPrintCharHeight * 1.5f;
804 
805  if (nextColor[0])
806  {
807  Q_strncpyz(currentColor, nextColor, 3);
808  }
809 
810  start = end + len;
811  }
812  }
813 
814  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
815 }

826 static void CG_DrawScopedReticle(void)
827 {
828  int weapon;
829 
830  // So that we will draw reticle
831  if ((cg.snap->ps.pm_flags & PMF_FOLLOW) || cg.demoPlayback)
832  {
833  weapon = cg.snap->ps.weapon;
834  }
835  else
836  {
837  weapon = cg.weaponSelect;
838  }
839 
840  if (!(GetWeaponTableData(weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_SCOPED))
841  {
842  return;
843  }
844 
845  // sides
846  CG_FillRect(0, 0, 80 + cgs.wideXoffset, SCREEN_HEIGHT, colorBlack);
847  CG_FillRect(560 + cgs.wideXoffset, 0, 80 + cgs.wideXoffset, SCREEN_HEIGHT, colorBlack);
848 
849  // center
850  if (cgs.media.reticleShaderSimple)
851  {
852  CG_DrawPic(80 + cgs.wideXoffset, 0, SCREEN_HEIGHT, SCREEN_HEIGHT, cgs.media.reticleShaderSimple);
853  }
854 
855  if (weapon == WP_FG42SCOPE)
856  {
857  // hairs
858  CG_FillRect(84 + cgs.wideXoffset, 239, 150, 3, colorBlack); // left
859  CG_FillRect(234 + cgs.wideXoffset, 240, 173, 1, colorBlack); // horiz center
860  CG_FillRect(407 + cgs.wideXoffset, 239, 150, 3, colorBlack); // right
861 
862 
863  CG_FillRect(319 + cgs.wideXoffset, 2, 3, 151, colorBlack); // top center top
864  CG_FillRect(320 + cgs.wideXoffset, 153, 1, 114, colorBlack); // top center bot
865 
866  CG_FillRect(320 + cgs.wideXoffset, 241, 1, 87, colorBlack); // bot center top
867  CG_FillRect(319 + cgs.wideXoffset, 327, 3, 151, colorBlack); // bot center bot
868  }
869  else if (weapon == WP_GARAND_SCOPE)
870  {
871  // hairs
872  CG_FillRect(84 + cgs.wideXoffset, 239, 177, 2, colorBlack); // left
873  CG_FillRect(320 + cgs.wideXoffset, 242, 1, 58, colorBlack); // center top
874  CG_FillRect(319 + cgs.wideXoffset, 300, 2, 178, colorBlack); // center bot
875  CG_FillRect(380 + cgs.wideXoffset, 239, 177, 2, colorBlack); // right
876  }
877  else if (weapon == WP_K43_SCOPE)
878  {
879  // hairs
880  CG_FillRect(84 + cgs.wideXoffset, 239, 177, 2, colorBlack); // left
881  CG_FillRect(320 + cgs.wideXoffset, 242, 1, 58, colorBlack); // center top
882  CG_FillRect(319 + cgs.wideXoffset, 300, 2, 178, colorBlack); // center bot
883  CG_FillRect(380 + cgs.wideXoffset, 239, 177, 2, colorBlack); // right
884  }

886 
890 static void CG_DrawMortarReticle(void)
891 {
892  vec4_t color = { 1.f, 1.f, 1.f, .5f };
893  vec4_t color_back = { 0.f, 0.f, 0.f, .25f };
894  vec4_t color_extends = { .77f, .73f, .1f, 1.f };
895  vec4_t color_lastfire = { .77f, .1f, .1f, 1.f };
896  vec4_t color_firerequest = { 1.f, 1.f, 1.f, 1.f };
897  float offset, localOffset;
898  int i, min, majorOffset, val, printval, fadeTime, requestFadeTime;
899  char *s;
900  float angle, angleMin, angleMax;
901  qboolean hasRightTarget, hasLeftTarget;
902 
903  // Background
904  CG_FillRect(136 + cgs.wideXoffset, 236, 154, 38, color_back);
905  CG_FillRect(290 + cgs.wideXoffset, 160, 60, 208, color_back);
906  CG_FillRect(350 + cgs.wideXoffset, 236, 154, 38, color_back);
907 
908  // Horizontal bar
909 
910  // bottom
911  CG_FillRect(140 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264, 150, 1, color); // left
912  CG_FillRect(350 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264, 150, 1, color); // right
913 
914  // 10 units - 5 degrees
915  // total of 360 units
916  // nothing displayed between 150 and 210 units
917  // 360 / 10 = 36 bits, means 36 * 5 = 180 degrees
918  // that means left is cg.predictedPlayerState.viewangles[YAW] - .5f * 180
919  angle = 360 - AngleNormalize360(cg.predictedPlayerState.viewangles[YAW] - 90.f);
920 
921  offset = (5.f / 65536) * ((int)(angle * (65536 / 5.f)) & 65535);
922  min = (int)(AngleNormalize360(angle - .5f * 180) / 15.f) * 15;
923  majorOffset = (int)(floor((int)floor(AngleNormalize360(angle - .5f * 180)) % 15) / 5);
924 
925  for (val = i = 0; i < 36; i++)
926  {
927  localOffset = i * 10.f + (offset * 2.f);
928 
929  if (localOffset >= 150 && localOffset <= 210)
930  {
931  if (i % 3 == majorOffset)
932  {
933  val++;
934  }
935  continue;
936  }
937 
938  if (i % 3 == majorOffset)
939  {
940  printval = min - val * 15 + 180;
941 
942  // rain - old tertiary abuse was nasty and had undefined result
943  if (printval < 0)
944  {
945  printval += 360;
946  }
947  else if (printval >= 360)
948  {
949  printval -= 360;
950  }
951 
952  s = va("%i", printval);
953  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(500 - localOffset + cgs.wideXoffset - .5f * CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, .15f, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont1), 244, .15f, .15f, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont1);
954  CG_FillRect(500 - localOffset + cgs.wideXoffset, 248, 1, 16, color);
955  val++;
956  }
957  else
958  {
959  CG_FillRect(500 - localOffset + cgs.wideXoffset, 256, 1, 8, color);
960  }
961  }
962 
963  // the extremes
964  // 30 degrees plus a 15 degree border
965  angleMin = AngleNormalize360(360 - (cg.pmext.mountedWeaponAngles[YAW] - 90.f) - (30.f + 15.f));
966  angleMax = AngleNormalize360(360 - (cg.pmext.mountedWeaponAngles[YAW] - 90.f) + (30.f + 15.f));
967 
968  // right
969  localOffset = (AngleNormalize360(angle - angleMin) / 5.f) * 10.f;
970  CG_FillRect(320 - localOffset + cgs.wideXoffset, 252, 2, 18, color_extends);
971 
972  // left
973  localOffset = (AngleNormalize360(angleMax - angle) / 5.f) * 10.f;
974  CG_FillRect(320 + localOffset + cgs.wideXoffset, 252, 2, 18, color_extends);
975 
976  // last fire pos
977  fadeTime = 0;
978  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(cg.lastFiredWeapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET) && cg.mortarImpactTime >= -1)
979  {
980  fadeTime = cg.time - (cg.predictedPlayerEntity.muzzleFlashTime + 5000);
981 
982  if (fadeTime < 3000)
983  {
984  float lastfireAngle;
985 
986  if (fadeTime > 0)
987  {
988  color_lastfire[3] = 1.f - (fadeTime / 3000.f);
989  }
990 
991  lastfireAngle = AngleNormalize360(360 - (cg.mortarFireAngles[YAW] - 90.f));
992 
993  localOffset = ((AngleSubtract(angle, lastfireAngle)) / 5.f) * 10.f;
994  CG_FillRect(320 - localOffset + cgs.wideXoffset, 252, 2, 18, color_lastfire);
995  }
996  }
997 
998  // mortar attack requests
999  hasRightTarget = hasLeftTarget = qfalse;
1000  for (i = 0; i < MAX_CLIENTS; i++)
1001  {
1002  requestFadeTime = cg.time - (cg.artilleryRequestTime[i] + 25000);
1003 
1004  if (requestFadeTime < 5000)
1005  {
1006  vec3_t dir;
1007  float yaw;
1008  float attackRequestAngle;
1009 
1010  VectorSubtract(cg.artilleryRequestPos[i], cg.predictedPlayerEntity.lerpOrigin, dir);
1011 
1012  // ripped this out of vectoangles
1013  if (dir[1] == 0.f && dir[0] == 0.f)
1014  {
1015  yaw = 0;
1016  }
1017  else
1018  {
1019  if (dir[0] != 0.f)
1020  {
1021  yaw = (atan2(dir[1], dir[0]) * 180 / M_PI);
1022  }
1023  else if (dir[1] > 0)
1024  {
1025  yaw = 90;
1026  }
1027  else
1028  {
1029  yaw = 270;
1030  }
1031  if (yaw < 0)
1032  {
1033  yaw += 360;
1034  }
1035  }
1036 
1037  if (requestFadeTime > 0)
1038  {
1039  color_firerequest[3] = 1.f - (requestFadeTime / 5000.f);
1040  }
1041 
1042  attackRequestAngle = AngleNormalize360(360 - (yaw - 90.f));
1043 
1044  yaw = AngleSubtract(attackRequestAngle, angleMin);
1045 
1046  if (yaw < 0)
1047  {
1048  if (!hasLeftTarget)
1049  {
1050  trap_R_SetColor(color_firerequest);
1051  CG_DrawPic(136 + 2 + cgs.wideXoffset, 236 + 38 - 10 + 1, 8, 8, cgs.media.ccMortarTargetArrow);
1052  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
1053 
1054  hasLeftTarget = qtrue;
1055  }
1056  }
1057  else if (yaw > 90)
1058  {
1059  if (!hasRightTarget)
1060  {
1061  trap_R_SetColor(color_firerequest);
1062  CG_DrawPic(350 + 154 - 10 + cgs.wideXoffset, 236 + 38 - 10 + 1, -8, 8, cgs.media.ccMortarTargetArrow);
1063  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
1064 
1065  hasRightTarget = qtrue;
1066  }
1067  }
1068  else
1069  {
1070  localOffset = ((AngleSubtract(angle, attackRequestAngle)) / 5.f) * 10.f;
1071 
1072  trap_R_SetColor(color_firerequest);
1073  CG_DrawPic(320 - localOffset - 8 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264 - 8, 16, 16, cgs.media.ccMortarTarget);
1074  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
1075  }
1076  }
1077  }
1078 
1079  // Vertical bar
1080 
1081  // sides
1082  CG_FillRect(295 + cgs.wideXoffset, 164, 1, 200, color); // left
1083  CG_FillRect(345 + cgs.wideXoffset, 164, 1, 200, color); // right
1084 
1085  // 10 units - 2.5 degrees
1086  // total of 200 units
1087  // 200 / 10 = 20 bits, means 20 * 2.5 = 50 degrees
1088  // that means left is cg.predictedPlayerState.viewangles[PITCH] - .5f * 50
1089  angle = AngleNormalize180(360 - (cg.predictedPlayerState.viewangles[PITCH] - 60));
1090 
1091  offset = (2.5f / 65536) * ((int)(angle * (65536 / 2.5f)) & 65535);
1092  min = floor((angle + .5f * 50) / 10.f) * 10;
1093  majorOffset = (int)(floor((int)((angle + .5f * 50) * 10.f) % 100) / 25);
1094 
1095  for (val = i = 0; i < 20; i++)
1096  {
1097  localOffset = i * 10.f + (offset * 4.f);
1098 
1099  if (i % 4 == majorOffset)
1100  {
1101  printval = min - val * 10;
1102 
1103  // old tertiary abuse was nasty and had undefined result
1104  if (printval <= -180)
1105  {
1106  printval += 360;
1107  }
1108  else if (printval >= 180)
1109  {
1110  printval -= 180;
1111  }
1112 
1113  s = va("%i", printval);
1114  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(320 + cgs.wideXoffset - .5f * CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, .15f, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont1), 164 + localOffset + .5f * CG_Text_Height_Ext(s, .15f, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont1), .15f, .15f, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont1);
1115  CG_FillRect(295 + 1 + cgs.wideXoffset, 164 + localOffset, 12, 1, color);
1116  CG_FillRect(345 - 12 + cgs.wideXoffset, 164 + localOffset, 12, 1, color);
1117  val++;
1118  }
1119  else
1120  {
1121  CG_FillRect(295 + 1 + cgs.wideXoffset, 164 + localOffset, 8, 1, color);
1122  CG_FillRect(345 - 8 + cgs.wideXoffset, 164 + localOffset, 8, 1, color);
1123  }
1124  }
1125 
1126  // the extremes
1127  // 30 degrees up
1128  // 20 degrees down
1129  angleMin = AngleNormalize180(360 - (cg.pmext.mountedWeaponAngles[PITCH] - 60)) - 20.f;
1130  angleMax = AngleNormalize180(360 - (cg.pmext.mountedWeaponAngles[PITCH] - 60)) + 30.f;
1131 
1132  // top
1133  localOffset = angleMax - angle;
1134  if (localOffset < 0)
1135  {
1136  localOffset = 0;
1137  }
1138  localOffset = (AngleNormalize360(localOffset) / 2.5f) * 10.f;
1139  if (localOffset < 100)
1140  {
1141  CG_FillRect(295 - 2 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264 - localOffset, 6, 2, color_extends);
1142  CG_FillRect(345 - 4 + 1 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264 - localOffset, 6, 2, color_extends);
1143  }
1144 
1145  // bottom
1146  localOffset = angle - angleMin;
1147  if (localOffset < 0)
1148  {
1149  localOffset = 0;
1150  }
1151  localOffset = (AngleNormalize360(localOffset) / 2.5f) * 10.f;
1152  if (localOffset < 100)
1153  {
1154  CG_FillRect(295 - 2 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264 + localOffset, 6, 2, color_extends);
1155  CG_FillRect(345 - 4 + 1 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264 + localOffset, 6, 2, color_extends);
1156  }
1157 
1158  // last fire pos
1159  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(cg.lastFiredWeapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET) && cg.mortarImpactTime >= -1)
1160  {
1161  if (fadeTime < 3000)
1162  {
1163  float lastfireAngle = AngleNormalize180(360 - (cg.mortarFireAngles[PITCH] - 60));
1164 
1165  if (lastfireAngle > angle)
1166  {
1167  localOffset = lastfireAngle - angle;
1168  if (localOffset < 0)
1169  {
1170  localOffset = 0;
1171  }
1172  localOffset = (AngleNormalize360(localOffset) / 2.5f) * 10.f;
1173  if (localOffset < 100)
1174  {
1175  CG_FillRect(295 - 2 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264 - localOffset, 6, 2, color_lastfire);
1176  CG_FillRect(345 - 4 + 1 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264 - localOffset, 6, 2, color_lastfire);
1177  }
1178  }
1179  else
1180  {
1181  localOffset = angle - lastfireAngle;
1182  if (localOffset < 0)
1183  {
1184  localOffset = 0;
1185  }
1186  localOffset = (AngleNormalize360(localOffset) / 2.5f) * 10.f;
1187  if (localOffset < 100)
1188  {
1189  CG_FillRect(295 - 2 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264 + localOffset, 6, 2, color_lastfire);
1190  CG_FillRect(345 - 4 + 1 + cgs.wideXoffset, 264 + localOffset, 6, 2, color_lastfire);
1191  }
1192  }
1193  }
1194  }
1195 }

1221 static void CG_DrawCrosshair(void)
1222 {
1223  float w, h;
1224  qhandle_t hShader;
1225  float f;
1226  float x, y;
1227  int weapnum;
1228 
1229  if (cg.renderingThirdPerson)
1230  {
1231  return;
1232  }
1233 
1234  // using binoculars
1235  if (cg.zoomedBinoc)
1236  {
1237  CG_DrawBinocReticle();
1238  return;
1239  }
1240 
1241  // show reticle in limbo and spectator
1242  if ((cg.snap->ps.pm_flags & PMF_FOLLOW) || cg.demoPlayback)
1243  {
1244  weapnum = cg.snap->ps.weapon;
1245  }
1246  else
1247  {
1248  weapnum = cg.weaponSelect;
1249  }
1250 
1251  // no weapon, no crosshair
1252  if (weapnum == WP_NONE && cg.snap->ps.persistant[PERS_TEAM] != TEAM_SPECTATOR)
1253  {
1254  return;
1255  }
1256 
1257  // special reticle for scoped weapon
1258  if (cg.zoomed)
1259  {
1260  if (!BG_PlayerMounted(cg.snap->ps.eFlags))
1261  {
1262  // don't let players prone moving and run with rifles -- speed 80 == crouch, 128 == walk, 256 == run
1263 /* if (VectorLengthSquared(cg.snap->ps.velocity) > Square(160) || cg.predictedPlayerState.eFlags & EF_PRONE_MOVING)
1264  {
1265  CG_FinishWeaponChange(cg.snap->ps.weapon, GetWeaponTableData(cg.snap->ps.weapon)->weapAlts);
1266  }
1267  else */if (
1268 #ifdef FEATURE_MULTIVIEW
1269  cg.mvTotalClients < 1 ||
1270 #endif
1271  cg.snap->ps.stats[STAT_HEALTH] > 0)
1272  {
1273  CG_DrawScopedReticle();
1274  }
1275 
1276  return;
1277  }
1278  }
1279 
1280  if (cg.snap->ps.eFlags & EF_PRONE_MOVING)
1281  {
1282  return;
1283  }
1284 
1285  // FIXME: spectators/chasing?
1286  if (CHECKBITWISE(GetWeaponTableData(cg.predictedPlayerState.weapon)->type, WEAPON_TYPE_MORTAR | WEAPON_TYPE_SET) && cg.predictedPlayerState.weaponstate != WEAPON_RAISING)
1287  {
1288  CG_DrawMortarReticle();
1289  return;
1290  }
1291 
1292  if (cg_drawCrosshair.integer < 0) // moved down so it doesn't keep the scoped weaps from drawing reticles
1293  {
1294  return;
1295  }
1296 
1297  // no crosshair while leaning
1298  if (cg.snap->ps.leanf != 0.f)
1299  {
1300  return;
1301  }
1302 
1303  // set color based on health
1304  if (cg_crosshairHealth.integer)
1305  {
1306  vec4_t hcolor;
1307 
1308  CG_ColorForHealth(hcolor);
1309  trap_R_SetColor(hcolor);
1310  }
1311  else
1312  {
1313  trap_R_SetColor(cg.xhairColor);
1314  }
1315 
1316  w = h = cg_crosshairSize.value;
1317 
1318  // crosshair size represents aim spread
1319  f = (float)((cg_crosshairPulse.integer == 0) ? 0 : cg.snap->ps.aimSpreadScale / 255.0);
1320  w *= (1 + f * 2.0f);
1321  h *= (1 + f * 2.0f);
1322 
1323  x = cg_crosshairX.integer;
1324  y = cg_crosshairY.integer;
1325  CG_AdjustFrom640(&x, &y, &w, &h);
1326 
1327  hShader = cgs.media.crosshairShader[cg_drawCrosshair.integer % NUM_CROSSHAIRS];
1328 
1329  trap_R_DrawStretchPic(x + 0.5f * (cg.refdef_current->width - w), y + 0.5f * (cg.refdef_current->height - h), w, h, 0, 0, 1, 1, hShader);
1330 
1331  if (cg.crosshairShaderAlt[cg_drawCrosshair.integer % NUM_CROSSHAIRS])
1332  {
1333  w = h = cg_crosshairSize.value;
1334  x = cg_crosshairX.integer;
1335  y = cg_crosshairY.integer;
1336  CG_AdjustFrom640(&x, &y, &w, &h);
1337 
1338  if (cg_crosshairHealth.integer == 0)
1339  {
1340  trap_R_SetColor(cg.xhairColorAlt);
1341  }
1342 
1343  trap_R_DrawStretchPic(x + 0.5f * (cg.refdef_current->width - w), y + 0.5f * (cg.refdef_current->height - h), w, h, 0, 0, 1, 1, cg.crosshairShaderAlt[cg_drawCrosshair.integer % NUM_CROSSHAIRS]);
1344  }
1345  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
1346 }

1351 static void CG_DrawNoShootIcon(void)

1354 
1355  if ((cg.predictedPlayerState.eFlags & EF_PRONE) && (GetWeaponTableData(cg.snap->ps.weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_PANZER))

1390 void CG_ScanForCrosshairMine(centity_t *cent)
1391 {
1392  trace_t trace;
1393  vec3_t start, end;
1394 
1395  VectorCopy(cg.refdef.vieworg, start);
1396  VectorMA(start, 512, cg.refdef.viewaxis[0], end);
1397 
1398  CG_Trace(&trace, start, NULL, NULL, end, -1, MASK_SOLID);
1399 
1400  if (Square(trace.endpos[0] - cent->currentState.pos.trBase[0]) < 256 &&
1401  Square(trace.endpos[1] - cent->currentState.pos.trBase[1]) < 256 &&
1402  Square(trace.endpos[2] - cent->currentState.pos.trBase[2]) < 256)
1403  {
1404  if (cent->currentState.otherEntityNum >= MAX_CLIENTS)
1405  {
1406  cg.crosshairMine = -1;
1407  }
1408  else
1409  {
1410  cg.crosshairMine = cent->currentState.otherEntityNum;
1411  cg.crosshairMineTime = cg.time;
1412  }
1413  }
1414 }

1421 void CG_ScanForCrosshairDyna(centity_t *cent)
1422 {
1423  trace_t trace;
1424  vec3_t start, end;
1425 
1426  VectorCopy(cg.refdef.vieworg, start);
1427  VectorMA(start, 512, cg.refdef.viewaxis[0], end);
1428

1430 
1431  // pos.trBase is not the middle of the dyna, but due to different
1432  // orientations relative to the map axis, this cannot be corrected in a
1433  // simple way unfortunately
1434  if (Square(trace.endpos[0] - cent->currentState.pos.trBase[0]) < 256 &&
1435  Square(trace.endpos[1] - cent->currentState.pos.trBase[1]) < 256 &&
1436  Square(trace.endpos[2] - cent->currentState.pos.trBase[2]) < 256)
1437  {
1438  if (cent->currentState.otherEntityNum >= MAX_CLIENTS)
1439  {
1440  cg.crosshairDyna = -1;
1441  }
1442  else
1443  {
1444  cg.crosshairDyna = cent->currentState.otherEntityNum;
1445  cg.crosshairDynaTime = cg.time;
1446  }
1447  }

1456 static float CG_ScanForCrosshairEntity(float *zChange, qboolean *hitClient)
1457 {
1458  trace_t trace;
1459  vec3_t start, end;
1460  float dist;
1461  centity_t *cent;
1462 
1463  // We haven't hit a client yet
1464  *hitClient = qfalse;
1465 
1466  VectorCopy(cg.refdef.vieworg, start);
1467  VectorMA(start, MAX_TRACE, cg.refdef.viewaxis[0], end);
1468 
1469  cg.crosshairClientNoShoot = qfalse;
1470 
1471  CG_Trace(&trace, start, NULL, NULL, end, cg.snap->ps.clientNum, CONTENTS_SOLID | CONTENTS_BODY | CONTENTS_ITEM);
1472 
1473  // How far from start to end of trace?
1474  dist = VectorDistance(start, trace.endpos);
1475 
1476  // How far up or down are we looking?
1477  *zChange = trace.endpos[2] - start[2];
1478 
1479  if (trace.entityNum >= MAX_CLIENTS)
1480  {
1481  if (cg_entities[trace.entityNum].currentState.eFlags & EF_TAGCONNECT)
1482  {
1483  trace.entityNum = cg_entities[trace.entityNum].tagParent;
1484  }
1485 
1486  // is a tank with a healthbar
1487  // this might have some side-effects, but none right now as the script_mover is the only one that sets effect1Time
1488  if ((cg_entities[trace.entityNum].currentState.eType == ET_MOVER && cg_entities[trace.entityNum].currentState.effect1Time) ||
1489  cg_entities[trace.entityNum].currentState.eType == ET_CONSTRUCTIBLE_MARKER)
1490  {
1491  // update the fade timer
1492  cg.crosshairClientNum = trace.entityNum;
1493  cg.crosshairClientTime = cg.time;
1494  cg.identifyClientRequest = cg.crosshairClientNum;
1495  }
1496 
1497  // Default: We're not looking at a client
1498  cg.crosshairNotLookingAtClient = qtrue;
1499 
1500  return dist;
1501  }
1502 
1503  // Reset the draw time for the SP crosshair
1504  cg.crosshairSPClientTime = cg.time;
1505 
1506  // Default: We're not looking at a client
1507  cg.crosshairNotLookingAtClient = qfalse;
1508 
1509  // We hit a client
1510  *hitClient = qtrue;
1511 
1512  // update the fade timer
1513  cg.crosshairClientNum = trace.entityNum;
1514  cg.crosshairClientTime = cg.time;
1515  if (cg.crosshairClientNum != cg.snap->ps.identifyClient && cg.crosshairClientNum != ENTITYNUM_WORLD)
1516  {
1517  cg.identifyClientRequest = cg.crosshairClientNum;
1518  }
1519 
1520  cent = &cg_entities[cg.crosshairClientNum];
1521 
1522  if (cent && (cent->currentState.powerups & (1 << PW_OPS_DISGUISED)))
1523  {
1524  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].team == cgs.clientinfo[cg.clientNum].team)
1525  {
1526  cg.crosshairClientNoShoot = qtrue;
1527  }
1528  }
1529 
1530  return dist;
1531 }
1532 
1537 void CG_CheckForCursorHints(void)
1538 {
1539  trace_t trace;
1540  vec3_t start, end;
1541  centity_t *tracent;
1542  float dist;
1543 
1544  if (cg.renderingThirdPerson)
1545  {
1546  return;
1547  }
1548 
1549  if (cg.snap->ps.serverCursorHint) // server is dictating a cursor hint, use it.
1550  {
1551  cg.cursorHintTime = cg.time;
1552  cg.cursorHintFade = 500; // fade out time
1553  cg.cursorHintIcon = cg.snap->ps.serverCursorHint;
1554  cg.cursorHintValue = cg.snap->ps.serverCursorHintVal;
1555  return;
1556  }
1557 
1558  // From here on it's client-side cursor hints. So if the server isn't sending that info (as an option)
1559  // then it falls into here and you can get basic cursorhint info if you want, but not the detailed info
1560  // the server sends.
1561 
1562  // the trace
1563  VectorCopy(cg.refdef_current->vieworg, start);
1564  VectorMA(start, CH_DIST, cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[0], end);
1565 
1566  CG_Trace(&trace, start, vec3_origin, vec3_origin, end, cg.snap->ps.clientNum, MASK_PLAYERSOLID);
1567 
1568  if (trace.fraction == 1.f)
1569  {
1570  // might be water
1571  if ((CG_PointContents(trace.endpos, -1) & CONTENTS_WATER) && !(CG_PointContents(cg.refdef.vieworg, -1) & CONTENTS_WATER))
1572  {
1573  cg.cursorHintIcon = HINT_WATER;
1574  cg.cursorHintTime = cg.time;
1575  cg.cursorHintFade = 500;
1576  cg.cursorHintValue = 0;
1577  }
1578  return;
1579  }
1580 
1581  dist = trace.fraction * CH_DIST;
1582 
1583  tracent = &cg_entities[trace.entityNum];
1584 
1585  // invisible entities don't show hints
1586  if (trace.entityNum >= MAX_CLIENTS &&
1587  (tracent->currentState.powerups == STATE_INVISIBLE || tracent->currentState.powerups == STATE_UNDERCONSTRUCTION))
1588  {
1589  return;
1590  }
1591 
1592  // world
1593  if (trace.entityNum == ENTITYNUM_WORLD)
1594  {
1595  if ((trace.surfaceFlags & SURF_LADDER) && !(cg.snap->ps.pm_flags & PMF_LADDER))
1596  {
1597  if (dist <= CH_LADDER_DIST)
1598  {
1599  cg.cursorHintIcon = HINT_LADDER;
1600  cg.cursorHintTime = cg.time;
1601  cg.cursorHintFade = 500;
1602  cg.cursorHintValue = 0;
1603  }
1604  }
1605  }
1606  else if (trace.entityNum < MAX_CLIENTS) // people
1607  { // knife
1608  if (GetWeaponTableData(cg.snap->ps.weapon)->type & WEAPON_TYPE_MELEE)
1609  {
1610  if (dist <= CH_KNIFE_DIST)
1611  {
1612  vec3_t pforward, eforward;
1613 
1614  AngleVectors(cg.snap->ps.viewangles, pforward, NULL, NULL);
1615  AngleVectors(tracent->lerpAngles, eforward, NULL, NULL);
1616 
1617  if (DotProduct(eforward, pforward) > 0.6f) // from behind(-ish)
1618  {
1619  cg.cursorHintIcon = HINT_KNIFE;
1620  cg.cursorHintTime = cg.time;
1621  cg.cursorHintFade = 100;
1622  cg.cursorHintValue = 0;
1623  }
1624  }
1625  }
1626  }
1627 }
1628 
1632 static void CG_DrawCrosshairNames(void)
1633 {
1634  float *color;
1635  float w;
1636  const char *s;
1637  int playerHealth = 0;
1638  qboolean drawStuff = qfalse;
1639  qboolean isTank = qfalse;
1640  int maxHealth = 1;
1641  float dist; // Distance to the entity under the crosshair
1642  float zChange;
1643  qboolean hitClient = qfalse;
1644  float middle = 320 + cgs.wideXoffset;
1645  float fontScale = cg_fontScaleCN.value;
1646 
1647  if (cg_drawCrosshair.integer < 0)
1648  {
1649  return;
1650  }
1651 
1652  // dyna > mine
1653  if (cg.crosshairDyna > -1)
1654  {
1655  color = CG_FadeColor(cg.crosshairDynaTime, 1000);
1656  s = va(CG_TranslateString("%s^7\'s dynamite"), cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairDyna].name);
1657  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1658  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(middle - w / 2, 182, fontScale, fontScale, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1659 
1660  cg.crosshairDyna = -1;
1661  return;
1662  }
1663 
1664  // mine id's
1665  if (cg.crosshairMine > -1)
1666  {
1667  color = CG_FadeColor(cg.crosshairMineTime, 1000);
1668  s = va(CG_TranslateString("%s^7\'s mine"), cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairMine].name);
1669  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1670  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(middle - w / 2, 182, fontScale, fontScale, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1671 
1672  cg.crosshairMine = -1;
1673  return;
1674  }
1675 
1676  // scan the known entities to see if the crosshair is sighted on one
1677  dist = CG_ScanForCrosshairEntity(&zChange, &hitClient);
1678 
1679  // don't draw crosshair names in shoutcast mode
1680  // shoutcasters can see tank and truck health
1681  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.clientNum].team == TEAM_SPECTATOR && cgs.clientinfo[cg.clientNum].shoutcaster &&
1682  cg_entities[cg.crosshairClientNum].currentState.eType != ET_MOVER)
1683  {
1684  return;
1685  }
1686 
1687  // world-entity or no-entity..
1688  if (cg.crosshairClientNum < 0)
1689  {
1690  return;
1691  }
1692 
1693  if (cg.renderingThirdPerson)
1694  {
1695  return;
1696  }
1697 
1698  // draw the name of the player being looked at
1699  color = CG_FadeColor(cg.crosshairClientTime, 1000);
1700 
1701  if (!color)
1702  {
1703  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
1704  return;
1705  }
1706 
1707  if (cg.crosshairClientNum >= MAX_CLIENTS)
1708  {
1709  if (!cg_drawCrosshairNames.integer && !cg_drawCrosshairInfo.integer)
1710  {
1711  return;
1712  }
1713 
1714  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].team != TEAM_SPECTATOR || cgs.clientinfo[cg.clientNum].shoutcaster)
1715  {
1716  if (cg_entities[cg.crosshairClientNum].currentState.eType == ET_MOVER && cg_entities[cg.crosshairClientNum].currentState.effect1Time)
1717  {
1718  isTank = qtrue;
1719 
1720  playerHealth = cg_entities[cg.crosshairClientNum].currentState.dl_intensity;
1721  maxHealth = 255;
1722 
1723  if (cg_drawCrosshairNames.integer > 0)
1724  {
1725  s = Info_ValueForKey(CG_ConfigString(CS_SCRIPT_MOVER_NAMES), va("%i", cg.crosshairClientNum));
1726  if (!*s)
1727  {
1728  return;
1729  }
1730 
1731  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1732  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(middle - w / 2, 182, fontScale, fontScale, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1733  }
1734  }
1735  else if (cg_entities[cg.crosshairClientNum].currentState.eType == ET_CONSTRUCTIBLE_MARKER)
1736  {
1737  if (cg_drawCrosshairNames.integer > 0)
1738  {
1739  s = Info_ValueForKey(CG_ConfigString(CS_CONSTRUCTION_NAMES), va("%i", cg.crosshairClientNum));
1740  if (*s)
1741  {
1742  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1743  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(middle - w / 2, 182, fontScale, fontScale, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1744  }
1745  }
1746  return;
1747  }
1748  }
1749 
1750  if (!isTank)
1751  {
1752  return;
1753  }
1754  }
1755  else if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].team != cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].team)
1756  {
1757  if ((cg_entities[cg.crosshairClientNum].currentState.powerups & (1 << PW_OPS_DISGUISED)) && cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].team != TEAM_SPECTATOR)
1758  {
1759  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].skill[SK_SIGNALS] >= 4 && cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].cls == PC_FIELDOPS)
1760  {
1761  s = CG_TranslateString("Disguised Enemy!");
1762  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1763  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(middle - w / 2, 182, fontScale, fontScale, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1764  return;
1765  }
1766  else if (dist > 0) // changed from 512 to grant covert ops more power
1767  {
1768  if (!cg_drawCrosshairNames.integer && !cg_drawCrosshairInfo.integer)
1769  {
1770  return;
1771  }
1772 
1773  drawStuff = qtrue;
1774 
1775  // draw the name and class
1776  if (cg_drawCrosshairNames.integer > 0)
1777  {
1778  if (cg_drawCrosshairNames.integer == 2)
1779  {
1780  // Draw with full coloring
1781  // fail safe - this should always be the case here - cg.crosshairClientNum is in game and disguised ...
1782  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].disguiseClientNum > -1)
1783  {
1784  s = va("%s", cgs.clientinfo[cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].disguiseClientNum].name);
1785  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1786  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(middle - w / 2, 182, fontScale, fontScale, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1787  }
1788  }
1789  else
1790  {
1791  // Draw them with a single color (white) // FIXME: name already clean
1792  // fail safe - this should always be the case here - cg.crosshairClientNum is in game and disguised ...
1793  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].disguiseClientNum > -1)
1794  {
1795  size_t colorizedBufferLength = 32;
1796  char colorized[32] = { 0 };
1797 
1798  Q_ColorizeString('7', cgs.clientinfo[cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].disguiseClientNum].cleanname, colorized, colorizedBufferLength);
1799 
1800  s = colorized;
1801  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1802  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(middle - w / 2, 182, fontScale, fontScale, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1803  }
1804  }
1805  }
1806  if (cg_drawCrosshairInfo.integer & CROSSHAIR_CLASS)
1807  {
1808  // - 16 - 110/2
1809  CG_DrawPic(middle - 71, 187, 16, 16, cgs.media.skillPics[SkillNumForClass((cg_entities[cg.crosshairClientNum].currentState.powerups >> PW_OPS_CLASS_1) & 7)]);
1810  }
1811  if (cgs.clientinfo[cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].disguiseClientNum].rank > 0 && (cg_drawCrosshairInfo.integer & CROSSHAIR_RANK))
1812  {
1813  // + 110/2
1814  CG_DrawPic(middle + 55, 187, 16, 16, rankicons[cgs.clientinfo[cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].disguiseClientNum].rank][cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].team != TEAM_AXIS ? 1 : 0][0].shader);
1815  }
1816 
1817  // set the health
1818  // - make sure it's the health for the right entity;
1819  // if it's not, use the clientinfo health (which is updated by tinfo)
1820  if (cg.crosshairClientNum == cg.snap->ps.identifyClient)
1821  {
1822  playerHealth = cg.snap->ps.identifyClientHealth;
1823  }
1824  else
1825  {
1826  playerHealth = cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].health;
1827  }
1828 
1829  maxHealth = 100;
1830  }
1831  // removed to grant covert ops more power
1832  // else
1833  // {
1834  // // don't show the name after you look away, should this be a disguised covert
1835  // cg.crosshairClientTime = 0;
1836  // return;
1837  // }
1838  }
1839  else
1840  {
1841  return;
1842  }
1843  }
1844 
1845  if (!cg_drawCrosshairNames.integer && !cg_drawCrosshairInfo.integer)
1846  {
1847  return;
1848  }
1849 
1850  // changed this from early-exiting if true, to only executing most stuff if false. We want to
1851  // show debug info regardless
1852 
1853  // we only want to see players on our team
1854  if (!isTank && !(cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].team != TEAM_SPECTATOR && cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].team != cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].team))
1855  {
1856  int i;
1857 
1858  drawStuff = qtrue;
1859 
1860  // draw the name and class
1861  if (cg_drawCrosshairNames.integer > 0)
1862  {
1863  char colorized[32] = { 0 };
1864  size_t colorizedBufferLength = 32;
1865 
1866  if (cg_drawCrosshairNames.integer == 2)
1867  {
1868  // Draw them with full colors
1869  s = va("%s", cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].name);
1870  }
1871  else
1872  {
1873  // Draw them with a single color (white)
1874  Q_ColorizeString('7', cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].cleanname, colorized, colorizedBufferLength);
1875  s = colorized;
1876  }
1877  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(s, fontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1878 
1879  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(middle - w / 2, 182, fontScale, fontScale, color, s, 0, 0, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
1880  }
1881  if (cg_drawCrosshairInfo.integer & CROSSHAIR_CLASS)
1882  {
1883  // - 16 - 110/2
1884  CG_DrawPic(middle - 71, 187, 16, 16, cgs.media.skillPics[SkillNumForClass(cg_entities[cg.crosshairClientNum].currentState.teamNum)]);
1885  }
1886  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].rank > 0 && (cg_drawCrosshairInfo.integer & CROSSHAIR_RANK))
1887  {
1888  // + 110/2
1889  CG_DrawPic(middle + 55, 187, 16, 16, rankicons[cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].rank][cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].team == TEAM_AXIS ? 1 : 0][0].shader);
1890  }
1891 
1892  // set the health
1893  if (cg.crosshairClientNum == cg.snap->ps.identifyClient)
1894  {
1895  playerHealth = cg.snap->ps.identifyClientHealth;
1896 
1897  // identifyClientHealth is sent as unsigned char and negative numbers are not transmitted - see SpectatorThink()
1898  // this results in player health values behind max health
1899  // adjust dead player health bogus values for the health bar
1900  if (playerHealth > 156)
1901  {
1902  playerHealth = 0;
1903  }
1904  }
1905  else
1906  {
1907  playerHealth = cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].health;
1908  }
1909 
1910  maxHealth = 100;
1911  for (i = 0; i < MAX_CLIENTS; i++)
1912  {
1913  if (!cgs.clientinfo[i].infoValid)
1914  {
1915  continue;
1916  }
1917 
1918  if (cgs.clientinfo[i].team != cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].team)
1919  {
1920  continue;
1921  }
1922 
1923  if (cgs.clientinfo[i].cls != PC_MEDIC)
1924  {
1925  continue;
1926  }
1927 
1928  maxHealth += 10;
1929 
1930  if (maxHealth >= 125)
1931  {
1932  maxHealth = 125;
1933  break;
1934  }
1935  }
1936 
1937  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].skill[SK_BATTLE_SENSE] >= 3)
1938  {
1939  maxHealth += 15;
1940  }
1941 
1942  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.crosshairClientNum].cls == PC_MEDIC)
1943  {
1944  maxHealth *= 1.12f;
1945  }
1946  }
1947 
1948  // draw the health bar
1949  // if ( isTank || (cg.crosshairClientNum == cg.snap->ps.identifyClient && drawStuff && cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].team != TEAM_SPECTATOR ) )
1950  {
1951  vec4_t bgcolor, c;
1952  float barFrac = (float)playerHealth / maxHealth;
1953 
1954  if (barFrac > 1.0f)
1955  {
1956  barFrac = 1.0;
1957  }
1958  else if (barFrac < 0)
1959  {
1960  barFrac = 0;
1961  }
1962 
1963  c[0] = 1.0f;
1964  c[1] = c[2] = barFrac;
1965  c[3] = (0.25f + barFrac * 0.5f) * color[3];
1966 
1967  Vector4Set(bgcolor, 1.f, 1.f, 1.f, .25f * color[3]);
1968 
1969  // - 110/2
1970  CG_FilledBar(middle - 55, 190, 110, 10, c, NULL, bgcolor, barFrac, 16);
1971  }
1972 
1973  if (isTank)
1974  {
1975  return;
1976  }
1977 
1978  if (drawStuff)
1979  {
1980  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
1981  }
1982 }

2362 static void CG_DrawIntermission(void)
2363 {
2364  // End-of-level autoactions
2365  if (!cg.demoPlayback)
2366  {
2367  static int doScreenshot = 0, doDemostop = 0;
2368 
2369  if (!cg.latchAutoActions)
2370  {
2371  cg.latchAutoActions = qtrue;
2372 
2373  if (cg_autoAction.integer & AA_SCREENSHOT)
2374  {
2375  doScreenshot = cg.time + 1000;
2376  }
2377 
2378  if (cg_autoAction.integer & AA_STATSDUMP)
2379  {
2380  CG_dumpStats_f();
2381  }
2382 
2383  if ((cg_autoAction.integer & AA_DEMORECORD) &&
2384  ((cgs.gametype == GT_WOLF_STOPWATCH && cgs.currentRound == 0) ||
2385  cgs.gametype != GT_WOLF_STOPWATCH))
2386  {
2387  doDemostop = cg.time + 5000; // stats should show up within 5 seconds
2388  }
2389  }
2390 
2391  if (doScreenshot > 0 && doScreenshot < cg.time)
2392  {
2393  CG_autoScreenShot_f();
2394  doScreenshot = 0;
2395  }
2396 
2397  if (doDemostop > 0 && doDemostop < cg.time)
2398  {
2399  trap_SendConsoleCommand("stoprecord\n");
2400  doDemostop = 0;
2401  }
2402  }
2403 
2404  // Intermission view
2405  CG_Debriefing_Draw();
2406 }

2481 float CG_CalculateReinfTime_Float(qboolean menu)
2482 {
2483  team_t team;
2484  int dwDeployTime;
2485 
2486  if (menu)
2487  {
2488  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.clientNum].team == TEAM_SPECTATOR)
2489  {
2490  team = cgs.ccSelectedTeam == 0 ? TEAM_AXIS : TEAM_ALLIES;
2491  }
2492  else
2493  {
2494  team = cgs.clientinfo[cg.clientNum].team;
2495  }
2496  }
2497  else
2498  {
2499  team = cgs.clientinfo[cg.snap->ps.clientNum].team;
2500  }
2501 
2502  dwDeployTime = (team == TEAM_AXIS) ? cg_redlimbotime.integer : cg_bluelimbotime.integer;
2503  return (1 + (dwDeployTime - ((cgs.aReinfOffset[team] + cg.time - cgs.levelStartTime) % dwDeployTime)) * 0.001f);
2504 }

2938 static void CG_DrawFlashFade(void)
2939 {
2940  static int lastTime;
2941  qboolean fBlackout = (int_ui_blackout.integer > 0);
2942 
2943  if (cgs.fadeStartTime + cgs.fadeDuration < cg.time)
2944  {
2945  cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent = cgs.fadeAlpha;
2946  }
2947  else if (cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent != cgs.fadeAlpha)
2948  {
2949  int time;
2950  int elapsed = (time = trap_Milliseconds()) - lastTime; // we need to use trap_Milliseconds() here since the cg.time gets modified upon reloading
2951 
2952  lastTime = time;
2953  if (elapsed < 500 && elapsed > 0)
2954  {
2955  if (cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent > cgs.fadeAlpha)
2956  {
2957  cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent -= ((float)elapsed / (float)cgs.fadeDuration);
2958  if (cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent < cgs.fadeAlpha)
2959  {
2960  cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent = cgs.fadeAlpha;
2961  }
2962  }
2963  else
2964  {
2965  cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent += ((float)elapsed / (float)cgs.fadeDuration);
2966  if (cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent > cgs.fadeAlpha)
2967  {
2968  cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent = cgs.fadeAlpha;
2969  }
2970  }
2971  }
2972  }
2973 
2974  // have to inform the ui that we need to remain blacked out (or not)
2975  if (int_ui_blackout.integer == 0)
2976  {
2977  if (
2978 #ifdef FEATURE_MULTIVIEW
2979  cg.mvTotalClients < 1 &&
2980 #endif
2981  cg.snap->ps.powerups[PW_BLACKOUT] > 0)
2982  {
2983  trap_Cvar_Set("ui_blackout", va("%d", cg.snap->ps.powerups[PW_BLACKOUT]));
2984  }
2985  }
2986  else if (cg.snap->ps.powerups[PW_BLACKOUT] == 0
2987 #ifdef FEATURE_MULTIVIEW
2988  || cg.mvTotalClients > 0
2989 #endif
2990  )
2991  {
2992  trap_Cvar_Set("ui_blackout", "0");
2993  }
2994 
2995  // now draw the fade
2996  if (cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent > 0.0f || fBlackout)
2997  {
2998  vec4_t col;
2999 
3000  VectorClear(col);
3001  col[3] = (fBlackout) ? 1.0f : cgs.fadeAlphaCurrent;
3002  CG_FillRect(0, 0, Ccg_WideX(SCREEN_WIDTH), SCREEN_HEIGHT, col);
3003 
3004  // bail out if we're a speclocked spectator with cg_draw2d = 0
3005  if (cgs.clientinfo[cg.clientNum].team == TEAM_SPECTATOR && !cg_draw2D.integer)
3006  {
3007  return;
3008  }
3009 
3010  // Show who is speclocked
3011  if (fBlackout)
3012  {
3013  int i, nOffset = 90;
3014  char *teams[TEAM_NUM_TEAMS] = { "??", "AXIS", "ALLIES", "???" }; // FIXME: translate team names? team name
3015  float color[4] = { 1, 1, 0, 1 };
3016 
3017  for (i = TEAM_AXIS; i <= TEAM_ALLIES; i++)
3018  {
3019  if (cg.snap->ps.powerups[PW_BLACKOUT] & i)
3020  {
3021  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(INFOTEXT_STARTX, nOffset, cg_fontScaleSP.value, cg_fontScaleSP.value, color, va(CG_TranslateString("The %s team is speclocked!"), teams[i]), 0, 0, ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWED, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
3022  nOffset += 12;
3023  }
3024  }
3025  }
3026  }

3071 static void CG_DrawFlashDamage(void)

3091  cg_bloodFlash.value);

3100 static void CG_DrawFlashFire(void)
3101 {
3102  float alpha;
3103 
3104  if (!cg.snap)
3105  {
3106  return;
3107  }
3108 
3109  if (cg.renderingThirdPerson)
3110  {
3111  return;
3112  }
3113 
3114  if (!cg.snap->ps.onFireStart)
3115  {
3116  cg.v_noFireTime = cg.time;
3117  return;
3118  }
3119 
3120  alpha = (float)((FIRE_FLASH_TIME - 1000) - (cg.time - cg.snap->ps.onFireStart)) / (FIRE_FLASH_TIME - 1000);
3121  if (alpha > 0)
3122  {
3123  vec4_t col = { 1, 1, 1, 1 };
3124  float max, f;
3125 
3126  if (alpha >= 1.0f)
3127  {
3128  alpha = 1.0f;
3129  }
3130 
3131  // fade in?

3133  if (f >= 0.0f && f < 1.0f)
3134  {
3135  alpha = f;
3136  }
3137 
3138  max = (float)(0.5 + 0.5 * sin((double)((cg.time / 10) % 1000) / 1000.0));
3139  if (alpha > max)
3140  {
3141  alpha = max;
3142  }
3143  col[0] = alpha;
3144  col[1] = alpha;

3149  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);

3152  }
3153  else

3156  }

3214 static void CG_DrawObjectiveInfo(void)
3215 {
3216  char *start, *end;
3217  int len;
3218  char currentColor[3] = S_COLOR_WHITE;
3219  char nextColor[3] = { 0, 0, 0 };
3220  int x, y, w;
3221  int x1, y1, x2, y2;
3222  float *color;
3223  vec4_t backColor = { 0.2f, 0.2f, 0.2f, 1.f };
3224 
3225  if (!cg.oidPrintTime)
3226  {
3227  return;
3228  }
3229 
3230  color = CG_FadeColor(cg.oidPrintTime, 250);
3231  if (!color)
3232  {
3233  cg.oidPrintTime = 0;
3234  return;
3235  }
3236 
3237  trap_R_SetColor(color);
3238 
3239  y = 400 - cg.oidPrintLines * cg.oidPrintCharHeight / 2;
3240 
3241  x1 = 319;
3242  y1 = y - cg.oidPrintCharHeight * 2;
3243  x2 = 321;
3244 
3245  // first just find the bounding rect
3246  for (start = end = cg.oidPrint; *start; end += len)
3247  {
3248  len = Q_UTF8_Width(end);
3249 
3250  if (!*end || *end == '\n')
3251  {
3252  char linebuffer[1024] = { 0 };
3253 
3254  Q_strncpyz(linebuffer, start, (end - start) + 1);
3255 
3256  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(va("%s ", linebuffer), cg.oidPrintFontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
3257 
3258  if (320 - w / 2 < x1)
3259  {
3260  x1 = 320 - w / 2;
3261  x2 = 320 + w / 2;
3262  }
3263 
3264  //x = 320 - w / 2; // no need to calculate x - it's not used and overwritten in next loop
3265  y += cg.oidPrintCharHeight * 1.5;
3266 
3267  start = end + len;
3268  }
3269  }
3270 
3271  y2 = y - 2;
3272 
3273  VectorCopy(color, backColor);
3274  backColor[3] = 0.5f * color[3];
3275  trap_R_SetColor(backColor);
3276 
3277  CG_DrawPic(x1 + cgs.wideXoffset, y1, x2 - x1, y2 - y1, cgs.media.teamStatusBar);
3278 
3279  VectorSet(backColor, 0, 0, 0);
3280  CG_DrawRect(x1 + cgs.wideXoffset, y1, x2 - x1, y2 - y1, 1, backColor);
3281 
3282  trap_R_SetColor(color);
3283 
3284  // do the actual drawing
3285  y = 400 - cg.oidPrintLines * cg.oidPrintCharHeight / 2;
3286 
3287  for (start = end = cg.oidPrint; *start; end += len)
3288  {
3289  if (Q_IsColorString(end))
3290  {
3291  // don't store color if the line start with a color
3292  if (start == end)
3293  {
3294  Com_Memset(currentColor, 0, 3);
3295  }
3296 
3297  // store the used color to reused it in case the line is splitted on multi line
3298  Q_strncpyz(nextColor, end, 3);
3299  len = 2;
3300  }
3301  else
3302  {
3303  len = Q_UTF8_Width(end);
3304  }
3305 
3306  if (!*end || *end == '\n')
3307  {
3308  char linebuffer[1024] = { 0 };
3309 
3310  if (*currentColor)
3311  {
3312  Q_strncpyz(linebuffer, currentColor, 3);
3313  Q_strcat(linebuffer, (end - start) + 3, start);
3314  }
3315  else
3316  {
3317  Q_strncpyz(linebuffer, start, (end - start) + 1);
3318  }
3319 
3320  w = CG_Text_Width_Ext(linebuffer, cg.oidPrintFontScale, 0, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
3321 
3322  if (x1 + w > x2)
3323  {
3324  x2 = x1 + w;
3325  }
3326 
3327  x = 320 - w / 2;
3328 
3329  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(x + cgs.wideXoffset, y, cg.oidPrintFontScale, cg.oidPrintFontScale, color, linebuffer, 0, 0, ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWED, &cgs.media.limboFont2);
3330 
3331  y += cg.oidPrintCharHeight * 1.5;
3332 
3333  if (nextColor[0])
3334  {
3335  Q_strncpyz(currentColor, nextColor, 3);
3336  }
3337 
3338  start = end + len;
3339  }
3340  }
3341 
3342  trap_R_SetColor(NULL);
3343 }

3409 static void CG_ScreenFade(void)
3410 {
3411  int msec;
3412 
3413  if (cg.fadeRate == 0.f)
3414  {
3415  return;
3416  }
3417 
3418  msec = cg.fadeTime - cg.time;
3419  if (msec <= 0)
3420  {
3421  cg.fadeColor1[0] = cg.fadeColor2[0];
3422  cg.fadeColor1[1] = cg.fadeColor2[1];
3423  cg.fadeColor1[2] = cg.fadeColor2[2];
3424  cg.fadeColor1[3] = cg.fadeColor2[3];
3425 
3426  if (cg.fadeColor1[3] == 0.f)
3427  {
3428  cg.fadeRate = 0;
3429  return;
3430  }
3431 
3432  CG_FillRect(0, 0, Ccg_WideX(SCREEN_WIDTH), SCREEN_HEIGHT, cg.fadeColor1);
3433 
3434  }
3435  else
3436  {
3437  vec4_t color;
3438  float t = ( float )msec * cg.fadeRate;
3439  float invt = 1.0f - t;
3440  int i;
3441 
3442  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
3443  {
3444  color[i] = cg.fadeColor1[i] * t + cg.fadeColor2[i] * invt;
3445  }
3446 
3447  if (color[3] != 0.f)
3448  {
3449  CG_FillRect(0, 0, Ccg_WideX(SCREEN_WIDTH), SCREEN_HEIGHT, color);
3450  }
3451  }
3452 }

3509 void CG_DrawOnScreenLabels(void)
3510 {
3511  static vec3_t mins = { -1, -1, -1 };
3512  static vec3_t maxs = { 1, 1, 1 };
3513  vec4_t white = { 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f };
3514  int i;
3515  specLabel_t *specLabel;
3516  trace_t tr;
3517  int FadeOut = 0;
3518  int FadeIn = 0;
3519 
3520  for (i = 0; i < cg.specStringCount; ++i)
3521  {
3522  specLabel = &cg.specOnScreenLabels[i];
3523 
3524  // Visible checks if information is actually valid
3525  if (!specLabel || !specLabel->visible)
3526  {
3527  continue;
3528  }
3529 
3530  CG_Trace(&tr, cg.refdef.vieworg, mins, maxs, specLabel->origin, -1, CONTENTS_SOLID);
3531 
3532  if (tr.fraction < 1.0f)
3533  {
3534  specLabel->lastInvisibleTime = cg.time;
3535  }
3536  else
3537  {
3538  specLabel->lastVisibleTime = cg.time;
3539  }
3540 
3541  FadeOut = cg.time - specLabel->lastVisibleTime;
3542  FadeIn = cg.time - specLabel->lastInvisibleTime;
3543 
3544  if (FadeIn)
3545  {
3546  white[3] = (FadeIn > 500) ? 1.0 : FadeIn / 500.0f;
3547  if (white[3] < specLabel->alpha)
3548  {
3549  white[3] = specLabel->alpha;
3550  }
3551  }
3552  if (FadeOut)
3553  {
3554  white[3] = (FadeOut > 500) ? 0.0 : 1.0f - FadeOut / 500.0f;
3555  if (white[3] > specLabel->alpha)
3556  {
3557  white[3] = specLabel->alpha;
3558  }
3559  }
3560  if (white[3] > 1.0f)
3561  {
3562  white[3] = 1.0f;
3563  }
3564 
3565  specLabel->alpha = white[3];
3566  if (specLabel->alpha <= 0.0f)
3567  {
3568  continue; // no alpha = nothing to draw..
3569  }
3570 
3571  CG_Text_Paint_Ext(specLabel->x, specLabel->y, specLabel->scale, specLabel->scale, white, specLabel->text, 0, 0, ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_SHADOWED, &cgs.media.limboFont1);
3572  // expect update next frame again
3573  specLabel->visible = qfalse;
3574  }
3575 
3576  cg.specStringCount = 0;
3577 }

3748 void CG_StartShakeCamera(float p)
3749 {
3750  cg.cameraShakeScale = p;
3751 
3752  cg.cameraShakeLength = 1000 * (p * p);
3753  cg.cameraShakeTime = cg.time + cg.cameraShakeLength;
3754  cg.cameraShakePhase = crandom() * M_PI; // start chain in random dir
3755 }
3756 
3760 void CG_ShakeCamera(void)
3761 {
3762  static vec3_t mins = { -16.0f, -16.0f, -16.0f };
3763  static vec3_t maxs = { 16.0f, 16.0f, 16.0f };
3764 
3765  if (cg.time > cg.cameraShakeTime)
3766  {
3767  cg.cameraShakeScale = 0; // all pending explosions resolved, so reset shakescale
3768  return;
3769  }
3770 
3771  {
3772  double x = (cg.cameraShakeTime - cg.time) / cg.cameraShakeLength;
3773  float valx = sin(M_PI * 8 * 13.0 + cg.cameraShakePhase) * x * 6 * cg.cameraShakeScale;
3774  float valy = sin(M_PI * 17 * x + cg.cameraShakePhase) * x * 6 * cg.cameraShakeScale;
3775  float valz = cos(M_PI * 7 * x + cg.cameraShakePhase) * x * 6 * cg.cameraShakeScale;
3776  vec3_t vec;
3777  trace_t tr;
3778 
3779  VectorAdd(cg.refdef.vieworg, tv(valx, valy, valz), vec);
3780  CG_Trace(&tr, cg.refdef.vieworg, mins, maxs, vec, cg.predictedPlayerState.clientNum, MASK_SOLID);
3781  if (!(tr.allsolid || tr.startsolid))
3782  {
3783  VectorCopy(tr.endpos, cg.refdef.vieworg);
3784  }
3785  AnglesToAxis(cg.refdefViewAngles, cg.refdef.viewaxis);
3786  }
3787 }

3833 
3837 void CG_Coronas(void)
3838 {
3839  if (cg_coronas.integer == 0)
3840  {
3841  return;
3842  }
3843 
3844  {
3845  int i;
3846  trace_t tr;
3847  float dist;
3848  vec3_t dir;
3849  qboolean visible, behind, toofar;
3850 
3851  for (i = 0 ; i < cg.numCoronas ; ++i)
3852  {
3853  if (!trap_R_inPVS(cg.refdef_current->vieworg, cgs.corona[i].org))
3854  {
3855  continue;
3856  }
3857 
3858  behind = qfalse; // 'init'
3859  toofar = qfalse; // 'init'
3860 
3861  VectorSubtract(cg.refdef_current->vieworg, cgs.corona[i].org, dir);
3862  dist = VectorNormalize2(dir, dir);
3863 
3864  if (dist > cg_coronafardist.integer)
3865  {
3866  toofar = qtrue;
3867  }
3868  // dot = DotProduct(dir, cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[0]);
3869  if (DotProduct(dir, cg.refdef_current->viewaxis[0]) >= -0.6f)
3870  {
3871  behind = qtrue;
3872  }
3873 
3874  if (cg_coronas.integer == 2)
3875  { // if set to '2' trace everything
3876  behind = qfalse;
3877  toofar = qfalse;
3878  }
3879 
3880  if (!behind && !toofar)
3881  {
3882  CG_Trace(&tr, cg.refdef_current->vieworg, NULL, NULL, cgs.corona[i].org, -1, MASK_SOLID | CONTENTS_BODY);
3883 
3884  visible = qfalse; // 'init'
3885  if (tr.fraction == 1.f)
3886  {
3887  visible = qtrue;
3888  }
